availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Harvey Morgan (Green County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Son of Jesse Morgan and Catherine Milby Morgan. Married to Susan Lee Morgan in Green County, Kentucky, on July 28, 1852. Father of George Morgan, Katy Morgan, Chrissa E. Morgan, Charles C. Morgan, Eliza J. Morgan, and Sarah E. Morgan. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Green County ion 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 636.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Greensburg, p. 406A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Green County, KY, September 1863, p. 119.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Marriages.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 17757.
